picklistValues.masterLabel: Battelle is lead party. Battelle will report new inventions to Sponsor, under the terms of a separate option IP option Sponsor may license new IP from Battelle. (DOE Approval NOT Required)
Battelle is lead party. No IP transferred, but Sponsor can own technical information (TI) created under the agreement (DOE Approval NOT Required)
Battelle is lead party. Sponsor gets royalty-free right to use TI subject to Battelle IP rights. (DOE Approval NOT Required)
Other- Please work with IPLS for phrasing (DOE Approval may or may not be Required)
Sponsor is lead party. Takes on all responsibilities under the class waiver. (DOE Approval NOT Required)
